game.name: Aelwater
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Memory has weight. The departed are not gone. Step into a village drowned by flood and memory, and search for the final answer about guardianship and farewell among the shattered past.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Memory has weight. The departed are not gone. Step into a village drowned by flood and memory, and search for the final answer about guardianship and farewell among the shattered past.
